content: संनिविश् {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To enter into, enter deeply. {@--2@} To encamp, sit down. {@--3@} To have intercourse or intimate connection with. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To place, put. {@--2@} To install or place on; धातोः स्थान इवादेशं सुग्रीवं संन्यवेशयत् <ls>R. 12. 58.</ls> {@--3@} To unite, join, collect. {@--4@} To introduce, insert, put in. {@--5@} To lodge, locate, station, encamp. {@--6@} To devolve upon, commit to, consign. {@--7@} To found (a town &c.). {@--8@} To fix the mind on. {@--9@} To contemplate, reflect upon.
